item.title: An Introduction to Functional Programming in JavaScript
item.description: This is the talk I gave at the JavaScript meetup in Phoenix. One the othe largest programming meetups in the valley. Here are the slides to the talk. Here’s some books that can help you get ramped up into the functional programming paradigm Introducing functional programming with Underscore.js by Michael Fogus. And for a more in depth look into functional patterns Professor Frisbyâ€™s Mostly Adequate Guide to Functional Programming.
